channel.title: Long lines go off the edge of the post-game chat screen
channel.description:
#### What happened?
If you type a line that's too long in the post-game chat screen, it accepts it, but your text will vanish off the right side of the box instead of wrapping around, causing it to be cut off.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
The line should either wrap, or it should prevent you from typing / sending a line that's too long in the first place.
#### Steps to reproduce:
Just end a game, and in the postgame chat, write a very long line.
#### Comments:
It's possible that this is dependent on resolution. I am playing fullscreen at 1920 x 1200.
